A.label: Distribution Statement A
A.text: Approved for public release; distribution is unlimited.
A.description: No restrictions on distribution. Typically applied to publicly funded, non-sensitive research.
A.usageGuidance: Use when the information is cleared for public release by the appropriate authority.

B.label: Distribution Statement B
B.text: Distribution authorized to U.S. Government agencies only
B.description: Limited to U.S. Government agencies. Others must request through the controlling DoD office.
B.usageGuidance: Include the reason for the restriction, the date of determination, and the controlling DoD office.

C.label: Distribution Statement C
C.text: Distribution authorized to U.S. Government agencies and their contractors
C.description: Available to U.S. Government agencies and their contractors for official use.

D.label: Distribution Statement D
D.text: Distribution authorized to the Department of Defense and U.S. DoD contractors only
D.description: Restricted to DoD and DoD contractors. Other government agencies must request access.

E.label: Distribution Statement E
E.text: Distribution authorized to DoD Components only
E.description: Most restrictive standard statement. Limited to DoD components only.

F.label: Distribution Statement F
F.text: Further dissemination only as directed by the controlling DoD office
F.description: The controlling office determines all further distribution. Each request is evaluated individually.

X.label: Distribution Statement X
X.text: Distribution authorized to U.S. Government agencies and private individuals or enterprises eligible to obtain export-controlled technical data
reasons: Export-controlled technical data subject to ITAR/EAR
X.description: For export-controlled technical data. Recipients must be eligible to receive such data.

markingFormat.example: DISTRIBUTION STATEMENT B. Distribution authorized to U.S. Government agencies only. Reason: Critical Technology. 15 Feb 2026. USACE HQ.
